caption.p: Biodiversity indices of longhorn beetles collected by the malaise trap from 41 collection sites in 6 geographic regions of Thailand. ( a) Species cumulative curve (individually-based rarefaction) with 95% confidence interval. ( b) SHE profiles represented the cumulative curve of ln S, H and ln E ( Y-axis = diversity values of the log abundance, Shannon_H index and log evenness; ( X-axis = number of specimens).
